General.Name: Phoenix Silicon International Corp
General.Description: Phoenix Silicon International Corporation operates in the wafer and energy industries in Taiwan. The company offers wafer reclaims for semiconductor IC manufacturing process monitoring; and wafer thinning products for conduction resistance, ultra-thin packaging or sealing, and flip chip thick metal packaging. It also provides lithium battery products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
General.Address: Hsinchu Science-Based Industrial Park, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30078
